name: Drone Party
description:
A fun simulation game where you deploy drones to protect a vulnerable planet!
Features
  • Protect the planet
  • 10+ Drones to pick from
  • Includes Bombs
  • Smart Drones
  • Duplicating Drones
  • And More!
Credits

Created by Brad Francis

Contact
  • Hit Me up on twitter @bradles36
Controls
  • Right click to destroy asteroids
  • Left click to focus on planet and Drones
  • Drag to Rotate the Camera
Updates

The game will have infrequent updates. If there is a major or annoying bug and will be be added to the fix list.
